name: CRT Planning Poker App
description: CRT Planning Poker App to estimate user stories for your Agile/Scrum teams. Create a session and invite your team members to estimate user stories efficiently. Intuitive UI/UX for voting the story points, showing team members voting status with emojis(üëç - Voting Done, ü§î - Yet to Vote). Session Moderator has full control on revealing story points and restarting the room session.
